content: tuku the forest spirit pattern by rcl intro tuku is a little baby bird that hatched 2023−09−29 on the mooneye studios discord server as its mascot https //discord gg/s79dpvnx3z as a forest spirit its natural fur color of green can change depending on the season orange in fall white in winter pink in spring or yellow in summer so feel free to use other colors for halloween it also likes to dress up in a costume e g as a werewolf mushroom eww or as a black cat scary note us abbr pattern level intermediate measurements its main body without appendices has a diameter of about 8 5cm -9 0cm comfortly �tting into one hand with fully spread wings it reaches a width of about 20cm i used yarn under / yarn over as a crochet technique abbreviations fo = fasten o� magic_ring = magic_ring bbl = bobble chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = decrease half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch materials yarns green green chenille yarn for its upper body bulky yellow yellow white-ish chenille yarn for its lower body bulky red red chenille yarn for its cheeks feet and tail bulky black black chenille yarn for its eyes and mouth bulky white white chenille yarn for the eye highlights bulky hooks - a 4 5 mm crochet hook needles - a sewing needle fabrics - stu�ng material i used foam material body head 01 green 7sc into a magic_ring 7 02 green 7inc 14 03 green 1sc 1inc x7 21 04 green 1sc 1inc 2sc 1inc x6 1sc 28 05 green 3sc 1inc x7 35 06 green 2sc 1inc 4sc 1inc x6 2sc 42 07 green 42sc 42 note that in the photos the color of the top loop is already di�erent ℹ to prepare for a cleaner color change in the next line face green 17sc red bbl green 2sc 1dec 2sc 08 red bbl green 17sc 41 ℹ close-up photo during the �rst bobble ℹ close-up photo after both bobbles green 17sc yellow 2sc green 1sc yellow 1inc 09 green 1sc yellow 2sc green 17sc 42 green 16sc yellow 10sc 10 green 16sc 42 green 15sc yellow 12sc 11 green 15sc 42 green 14sc yellow 14sc 12 green 14sc 42 green 12sc yellow 18sc 13 green 12sc 42 embroider the mouth with black yarn between the two red ℹ bobbles along the color changes embroider the eyes with black and white yarn next to the two ℹ bobbles or alternatively use safety eyes bottom green 2sc 1dec 4sc 1dec yellow 4sc 1dec x3 4sc 14 green 1dec 4sc 1dec 2sc 35 green 3sc 1dec 1sc yellow 2sc 1dec 3sc x3 1dec 2sc 1dec 15 green 4sc 1dec 28 green 1sc 1dec 1sc yellow 1sc 1dec 2sc 1dec x4 1sc 16 green 1sc 1dec 1sc 21 ℹ begin stu�ng 17 yellow 1sc 1dec x7 14 ℹ continue stu�ng 18 yellow 7dec 7 ℹ finish stu�ng 19 yellow 3dec 1slst
